mapper.sql: sa.address_id, sa.province_code, sa.city_code, sa.classify_code, sa.address_detail, sa.post_code, sa.status, sa.create_user_id, sa.create_time, sa.modified_user_id, sa.modified_time, sa.is_delete, sa.option1, sa.option2, sa.option3, sa.organization_id, sa.remark
mapper.select:
SELECT, su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, bo.organization_name FROM smt_address sa LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON sa.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON sa.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON sa.organization_id = bo.organization_id
and date_format(sa.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and sa.province_code like CONCAT('%', #{provinceCode}, '%')
and sa.city_code like CONCAT('%', #{cityCode}, '%')
and sa.classify_code like CONCAT('%', #{classifyCode}, '%')
and sa.address_detail like CONCAT('%', #{addressDetail}, '%')
and sa.post_code like CONCAT('%', #{postCode}, '%')
and sa.status=#{status}
order by sa.create_time desc
select ,ssa.if_default from fantech_imes.smt_supplier_address ssa LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_address sa ON sa.address_id = ssa.address_id where ssa.supplier_id =#{supplierId}

update.foreach: update fantech_imes.smt_address sa set sa.province_code = #{item.provinceCode}, sa.city_code = #{item.cityCode}, sa.classify_code = #{item.classifyCode}, sa.address_detail = #{item.addressDetail}, sa.post_code = #{item.postCode}, sa.organization_id = #{item.organizationId}, sa.remark = #{item.remark}, sa.status = #{item.status}, sa.modified_user_id = #{item.modifiedUserId}, sa.modified_time = #{item.modifiedTime}, sa.is_delete = #{item.isDelete} where sa.address_id = #{item.addressId}
